title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki - XWiki
content:
00:43 <jvelociter\_> has joined #xwiki  
00:45 <jvelociter> has quit  
00:45 <jvelociter\_> is now known as <jvelociter>  
00:54 <jvdrean> has quit  
01:32 <webgraphics> has joined #xwiki  
02:25 <webgraphics> has quit  
02:51 <abusenius> has quit  
04:37 <jamesxu> has quit  
05:03 <DrLou> has quit  
05:14 <DrLou> has joined #xwiki  
07:00 <Denis> has quit  
07:08 <Denis> has joined #xwiki  
07:42 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
08:06 <DrLou> has quit  
08:28 <tmortagne> has joined #xwiki  
08:36 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
08:43 <vmassol> good morning  
08:43 <vmassol> mflorea: I added some notes to https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-enterprise/commit/e2e097c1a3cf900895ff164bfc00404b9d9259d2#commitcomment-456758 ;)  
08:47 <+mflorea> vmassol: thanks, I'll improve the javadoc in AbstractTest using you comment  
08:48 <vmassol> ok :)  
08:48 <+mflorea> btw, http://ci.xwiki.org/job/xwiki-enterprise-tests/804/console stuck at ImportTest#testImportHasNoPackageByDefault  
08:48 <vmassol> ok checking code but that's strange it's not stopping here  
08:49 <+mflorea> haven't run it locally yet, I'm finishing reading my mails (lots of mails from Paul Harris on users)  
08:49 <vmassol> ok checked the test  
08:49 <vmassol> there's no reason it will hang there  
08:50 <vmassol> it's a one liner:         Assert.assertEquals(0, this.sectionPage.getPackageNames().size());  
08:50 <vmassol> and getPackageNames does use findElementWithoutWaiting  
08:54 <+mflorea> vmassol: XWiki is responding on agent 2, I can wget Main.WebHome from the agent.  
08:56 <vmassol> wow indeed lots of mail from paul harris  
09:04 <+tmortagne> yep  
09:06 <+tmortagne> cjdelisle: you should put yourself on http://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Filesystem+Attachment+Porter and instead of XWiki Development Team otherwise it means it's supported by XWiki Development Team as a whole, IMO the only things supported by XWiki Development Team are on https://github.com/xwiki/  
09:07 <vmassol> +1  
09:07 <vmassol> (that's been our rule)  
09:12 <@cjdelisle> can do  
09:19 <arkub> has joined #xwiki  
09:36 <jvdrean> has joined #xwiki  
09:41 <florinciu> has joined #xwiki  
09:59 <+jvelociter> looks like google indexes stuff in /get/ on xwiki.org  
10:00 <+jvelociter> I have extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/get/Main/WebHome as first result for a query on google  
10:01 <sburjan> has joined #xwiki  
10:06 <evalica> has joined #xwiki  
10:12 <Enygma`> has joined #xwiki  
11:19 <vmassol> mflorea: wow thanks for the fix, cn't believe I had used equals (didn't check but it was probably my code)  
11:20 <+mflorea> :) np  
11:24 <jvelociter> has quit  
11:52 <abusenius> has joined #xwiki  
12:10 <+sburjan> guys, on http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/ReleaseNotes/ReleaseNotesXWikiEnterprise31 on the Miscellaneous sections we  have something like: New Success Macro. For example: icon:tick Success macro, you can access this by writing {{success}}text here{{/success}}  
12:10 <+sburjan> and it looks like broken image on Chrome  
12:10 <@cjdelisle> yup  
12:10 <+sburjan> also not getting any image/icon on Firefox  
12:13 <@cjdelisle> thanks for pointing it out  
12:22 <+sburjan> np :)  
13:01 <abusenius> has quit  
13:20 <+Denis> mflorea: Hi, I have fixed XWIKI-6754, but I really wonder if this could go in 3.1, in absence of Sergiu, would you mind to have a look ? Or any other JS expert out there ?  
13:21 <+mflorea> Denis: I will, did you commit? or did you make a pull request?  
13:21 <+Denis> here is the patch: http://goo.gl/xmMHm  
13:21 <+mflorea> ok  
13:22 <vmassol> wow not a small change  
13:22 <vmassol> Showing 17 changed files with 219 additions and 191 deletions.  
13:22 <+Denis> not reflective of the real change  
13:23 <+mflorea> Denis, by 3.1 you mean 3.1 branch, so the 3.1.1 release right?  
13:23 <+Denis> but, yes, I mean 3.1 branch  
13:23 <+Denis> since this breaks LiveTable in FF, which I consider major  
13:49 <arkub> has quit  
13:55 <DrLou> has joined #xwiki  
14:24 <abusenius> has joined #xwiki  
14:25 <abusenius> has left #xwiki  
14:25 <abusenius> has joined #xwiki  
14:33 <evalica> has quit  
14:38 <+sburjan> how can I change branches within terminal ?  
14:39 <vmassol> git checkout  
15:57 <+Denis> mflorea: Thanks for the review, WDYT now for 3.1, or only 3.2 ?  
15:58 <+mflorea> I think it's safe for 3.1  
15:59 <+Denis> ok, I fix the details, commit to both and document the fix like you have suggested  
16:00 <+mflorea> great  
16:33 <+sburjan> vmassol: did you manage to successfully use latest SE with our tests ?  
16:33 <+mflorea> vmassol: we have 7 validation tests failing ( http://ci.xwiki.org/job/xwiki-enterprise-tests/org.xwiki.enterprise$xwiki-enterprise-test-webstandards/806/testReport/ ) because when you view the wiki page defining a panel and that panel is present in the left/right column you get duplicated HTML IDs. I don't see how this tests were passing before. What's the procedure in this case? This is clearly an issue on our side.  
16:35 <+mflorea> The best solution is to namespace HTML IDs generated by a panel so that they don't duplicate IDs defined in the wiki page content.  
16:42 <mflorea> has quit  
16:44 <vmassol> otp  
16:45 <sburjan> has quit  
16:46 <arkub> has joined #xwiki  
16:52 <abusenius> has quit  
17:32 <Enygma`> has quit  
17:54 <vmassol> sburjan`: yes  
17:55 <vmassol> sburjan`: https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-enterprise/blob/master/xwiki-enterprise-test/xwiki-enterprise-test-ui/pom.xml#L40
